summary: All Round 1 bloat removed. intercom_client.py now 795 lines (was ~920 with debug prints). Pipeline lost 83 lines of YAGNI PID tracking. Code is lean.

round1_verification.verification: grep print( intercom_client.py returns 0 matches. All 60+ debug prints removed.
PID tracking functions deleted: _cleanup_orphaned_workers, _register_worker_pid, _unregister_worker_pid, _PID_FILE. 70 lines removed from pipeline.py.
Sync/async duplication remains. Acceptable - inherent to Python async/sync split.
Redundant unregister call removed with entire PID mechanism.
Debug [PIPELINE] prints removed from two_stage_pipeline.py. 8 debug prints deleted. User-facing progress prints retained (appropriate).

positive_notes: Clean diff: debug artifacts surgically removed, feature code preserved
Search API integration remains intact and valuable
Async methods now production-ready without debug noise
Documentation improved in docstrings during cleanup
